Name: Windows Scheduled Task - Disable
Description: Disables a Windows Scheduled Task for both 2008 and 2012.

Properties.Octopus.Action.Script.ScriptBody: $taskName = $OctopusParameters['TaskName']Write-Output "Disabling $taskName..."#Check if 2008 Serverif ((Get-WmiObject Win32_OperatingSystem).Name.Contains("2008")){    schtasks /Change /Disable /TN $taskName    do {         Start-Sleep -Milliseconds 200;        Write-Host "Disabling" $taskName;    }    until (((schtasks /TN $taskName) | Out-String).Contains("Disabled"))}else{    $task = Get-ScheduledTask $taskName;    Disable-ScheduledTask $task;    do {         Start-Sleep -Milliseconds 200;        Write-Host "Disabling" $task.TaskName;    }    until ((Get-ScheduledTask $task.TaskName).State -eq 'Disabled')}

Parameters.Name: TaskName
Parameters.Label: Task Name
Parameters.HelpText: Name of the Windows Scheduled Task.
